info.description: REST API for projects, tasks, and comments.
info.title: Project Management API

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token.
Create a user account and return JWT token.

get.description: List comments with pagination, sorting, and filtering.

parameters.description: Sort by field (prefix with - for desc)
parameters.name: sort

put.description: Partially update a comment by ID.

get.description: List projects with pagination, sorting, filtering, and optional include of tasks.

parameters.description: Sort by field (prefix with - for desc)
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Get a project by ID. Optionally include tasks.

put.description: Partially update a project by ID.

delete.description: Delete a project by ID. Returns 204 even if it did not exist.

get.description: List tasks under a specific project with pagination, sorting, and filtering.

parameters.description: Sort by field (prefix with - for desc)
parameters.name: sort

post.description: Create a new task under a specific project.

get.description: List tasks with pagination, sorting, filtering, and optional include of comments.

parameters.description: Sort by field (prefix with - for desc)
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Get a task by ID. Optionally include comments.

put.description: Partially update a task by ID. To clear dueDate, send {"dueDate": null}.

get.description: List comments under a specific task with pagination, sorting, and filtering.

parameters.description: Sort by field (prefix with - for desc)
parameters.name: sort

post.description: Create a new comment under a specific task.
